page.title: 08Lockington CofE School.
page.content: {Lockington C of E School}is the only school in our block.The children from {Lund}come to{Lockington School} and the children from{Kilnwick}go to {Beswick}school.In our school we have 3 class_rooms which go from infantsto upper juniors.The infants start school when they are 5 and leave the class when they are 7.The next class is the lower juniors and they leave when they are 9.The last class is the upper juniors and they leave to the secondary school at 11. The secondary school is in{Beverley}and is six miles away.Each class has toilets and a cloak_room.The hall is used for assemblies,P.E and dinners.The school also has a kitchen and staff_room.The field is at the back of the school.The playground is used for netball and the field is used for football and rounders.
